panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    rate(libp2p_data_transfer_bytes_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", protocol!~"global sent", protocol=~".* sent"}[$__interval]),
    "protocol",
    "$1",
    "protocol",
    "(.*) sent"
)

panels.description: The TCP listener will temporarily shut itself down if maxConnections is reached
panels.title: Listening

panels.description: Peers are pinged to prevent them from being evicted from the routing table
panels.title: Ping old contact queue
Routing table ping old contact time

panels.description: Peers are pinged before they are added to the routing table
panels.title: Ping new contact queue
Routing table ping new contact time
